text: bestgore.com was a Canadian shock site owned by Mark Marek. The website was founded in 2008 and went defunct in 2020. The site received media attention in 2012 for a video depicting the murder of Jun Lin committed by Luka Magnotta. As a result, the owner Marek was arrested and charged. Category:Shock sites Category:2008 establishments in Canada Category:2020 disestablishments Category:Canadian websites
title: Bestgore.com
